bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Note from Robert U. Patterson to [Jefferson Randolph Kean?], [July, 1925]

div1.p: Patterson sends Kean a letter he has written to William Duffield Robinson, correcting a statement about Gorgas that Robinson made in a paper.

div1.head: Note from Robert U. Patterson to [Jefferson Randolph Kean?], [July, 1925]
div1.p:
For your
information my
comment to Dr Robinson
His article appeared on
The “Weekly Roster and
Medical Digest July 11/25”.
